actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Defense Production Act of 1950 to include products produced from coal gasification and coal liquefaction which may be used as fuels under title III in order to encourage the development of coal gasification and coal liquefaction.

summary.text: Includes products produced from coal gasification and coal liquefaction which may be used as fuels for Government use or resale under the Defense Production Act of 1950 in order to encourage the development of coal gasification and coal liquefaction.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Defense Production Act of 1950 to include products produced from coal gasification and coal liquefaction which may be used as fuels under title III in order to encourage the development of coal gasification and coal liquefaction.
